CustomField.inlineHelpText: Define when this limit is overridden. If the limit override policy is set per limit in Field Service Settings: Empty value - no override. 0 - override starts at midnight on the day of service. Positive integer - override starts this number of hours after midnight. Negative integer - override starts this number of hours before midnight. If the limit override policy isnâ€™t set per limit, this value is ignored.
